body_html:
Thanks @apaszke
Solution:

  • Download Command Line Tool for 8.3.2 from https://developer.apple.com/download/more/
  • Run 'sudo xcode-select --switch /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools'
  • Test clang --version:
Apple LLVM version 8.1.0 (clang-802.0.42)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.0.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin

Then install PyTorch again.

body:
Thanks @apaszke 
Solution:
- Download `Command Line Tool for 8.3.2` from https://developer.apple.com/download/more/
- Run 'sudo xcode-select --switch /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools'
- Test `clang --version`:
```
Apple LLVM version 8.1.0 (clang-802.0.42)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.0.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin
```
Then install PyTorch again.
